Text.Page:
We believe nexuses are created by a distortion of dimensions.

If so, we might be able to send nexus monsters back across the dimensions with a symbol of distorted dimension.

Of course, it's just a theory. Speaking of which, I'd like you to test it.

My research isn't complete, so the symbol may not be effective against anything other than lesser nexus creatures.

If anything goes wrong, you'll have "eliminate" that monster.

Good luck.

Unfortunate. I felt certain the symbol would prove efficacious. Where did I go wrong?

A problem for another time. Thank you for your courage, .
